## InlineNode.unformatAmbient() method

Unapplies the ambient style of the specified theme from the current node and returns the updated node.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
unformatAmbient(theme: FlowTheme): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  theme | [FlowTheme](./scribing.flowtheme.md) | The theme that provides ambient styling |

<b>Returns:</b>

this
